version_description:
- Fixed some minor problems and enhanced overall performance.
What's New in Version 3.1
- iCloud or Dropbox synchronization - makes possible to have identical data on all devices connected to Internet;
- Enhanced graph view - mood entries from a broader time range are available for viewing.

- Fixed some minor problems and enhanced overall performance.
What's New in Version 3.1
- iCloud or Dropbox synchronization - makes possible to have identical data on all devices connected to Internet;
- Enhanced graph view - mood entries from a broader time range are available for viewing.

- Fixed some minor problems and enhanced overall performance.
What's New in Version 3.1
- iCloud or Dropbox synchronization - makes possible to have identical data on all devices connected to Internet;
- Enhanced graph view - mood entries from a broader time range are available for viewing.

- Fixed some minor problems and enhanced overall performance.
What's New in Version 3.1
- iCloud or Dropbox synchronization - makes possible to have identical data on all devices connected to Internet;
- Enhanced graph view - mood entries from a broader time range are available for viewing.

Fixed the problem with incorrect text displaying on iPhone 4/iPad on creating a mood entry in landscape mode.
What's New in Version 3.1
- iCloud or Dropbox synchronization - makes possible to have identical data on all devices connected to Internet;
- Enhanced graph view - mood entries from a broader time range are available for viewing.

Fixed the problem with incorrect text displaying on iPhone 4/iPad on creating a mood entry in landscape mode.
What's New in Version 3.1
- iCloud or Dropbox synchronization - makes possible to have identical data on all devices connected to Internet;
- Enhanced graph view - mood entries from a broader time range are available for viewing.

- An option to save geolocation information for each mood entry. This information will be invisible until one of the next updates, when an interface will be implemented for analysing dependency of mood on location. It is possible not to choose this option in the dialogue at first launch of the app.
- Fixed some issues and enhanced overall performance.

- An option to save geolocation information for each mood entry. This information will be invisible until one of the next updates, when an interface will be implemented for analysing dependency of mood on location. It is possible not to choose this option in the dialogue at first launch of the app.
- Fixed some issues and enhanced overall performance.

- Added visualization of moods on the map - if geolocation is enabled, the app will automatically link moods to places where mood records were created. For each place you'll see either an average mood or a colorful pie-chart with all moods linked to the place.
- Fixed the problem with displaying records after backup.
- Fixed some minor issues.

- Added visualization of moods on the map - if geolocation is enabled, the app will automatically link moods to places where mood records were created. For each place you'll see either an average mood or a colorful pie-chart with all moods linked to the place.
- Fixed the problem with displaying records after backup.
- Fixed some minor issues.

- Fixed the problem with crashing on synchronization.
What's New in Version 3.2.6
- Added visualization of moods on the map - if geolocation is enabled, the app will automatically link moods to places where mood records were created. For each place you'll see either an average mood or a colorful pie-chart with all moods linked to the place.
- Fixed the problem with displaying records after backup.
- Fixed some minor issues.

- Fixed the problem with crashing on synchronization.
What's New in Version 3.2.6
- Added visualization of moods on the map - if geolocation is enabled, the app will automatically link moods to places where mood records were created. For each place you'll see either an average mood or a colorful pie-chart with all moods linked to the place.
- Fixed the problem with displaying records after backup.
- Fixed some minor issues.

- Added support of Chinese language;
- Added additional alphabetical sorting of tags;
- Fixed problems with backup and long records on some devices.
What's New in Version 3.2.7
- Fixed the problem with crashing on synchronization.
What's New in Version 3.2.6
- Added visualization of moods on the map - if geolocation is enabled, the app will automatically link moods to places where mood records were created. For each place you'll see either an average mood or a colorful pie-chart with all moods linked to the place;
- Fixed the problem with displaying records after backup;
- Fixed some minor issues.

- Added support of Chinese language;
- Added additional alphabetical sorting of tags;
- Fixed problems with backup and long records on some devices.
What's New in Version 3.2.7
- Fixed the problem with crashing on synchronization.
What's New in Version 3.2.6
- Added visualization of moods on the map - if geolocation is enabled, the app will automatically link moods to places where mood records were created. For each place you'll see either an average mood or a colorful pie-chart with all moods linked to the place;
- Fixed the problem with displaying records after backup;
- Fixed some minor issues.

- Added the ability to create a separate template for each reminder;
- Added highlighting for tags already added to a mood record;
- Added horizontal lines representing the mood scale for all graphs.

- Added the ability to create a separate template for each reminder;
- Added highlighting for tags already added to a mood record;
- Added horizontal lines representing the mood scale for all graphs.
Fixed app crash for some users who updated application from previous versions.
Fixed app crash for some users who updated application from previous versions.

- Added the possibility to select a period to review for the main chart in the Summary screen: the whole period, the current year, the current quarter, the current month, 30 days;
- Fixed entering units of measurement for quantitative tags - now the entered unit of measurement can be deleted from the existing tag (in previous versions the unit of measurement was added automatically);
- Improved algorithm for building graphs;
- Added the option to increase thickness of the graph line in the graph settings (for visually impaired users);
- Added the carriage return button for templates.

- Added the possibility to select a period to review for the main chart in the Summary screen: the whole period, the current year, the current quarter, the current month, 30 days;
- Fixed entering units of measurement for quantitative tags - now the entered unit of measurement can be deleted from the existing tag (in previous versions the unit of measurement was added automatically);
- Improved algorithm for building graphs;
- Added the option to increase thickness of the graph line in the graph settings (for visually impaired users);
- Added the carriage return button for templates.
Backup and restore from Dropbox are fixed.
Backup and restore from Dropbox are fixed.
Improved stability of the application.
Improved stability of the application.
